tweet.text: Secretary Shultz played a crucial role in developing policy for the summit meetings between President Reagan and Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev. In Nov. 1985, Shultz briefed Reagan on “What to Expect from Gorbachev in Geneva”: https://t.co/ieCri8N6py 📷 @Reagan_Library https://t.co/Ol0UOQqOOA
